name: Chilliwack Hop Farms
about: IS ON A MISSION TO BRING BACK LARGE-SCALE HOP GROWING TO THE FRASER VALLEY AND TO FEED THE INSATIABLE DEMAND FOR LOCALLY GROWN HOPS IN BCâ€™S BOOMING CRAFT BREWING INDUSTRY.

name: Topp's Hops
about: We are a family owned and operated hop farm in Abbotsford, BC Canada. Established in the spring of 2015, Topp's Hops is dedicated to being part of the accelerating hop industry resurgence going on in the Fraser Valley of British Columbia, Canada. Local brewers have created an overwhelming demand for local ingredients and Topp's Hops is stepping up to answer their call. With putting quality before quantity, we look to become, "The Finest on the 49th North".

name: Hops Connect
about: Centrally located in Pemberton B.C. with offices in Singapore and Exeter, Ontario.  Hops Connect is Canadian-owned and operated hop growing, processing and distribution hop trading house. Hops Connect is dedicated to connecting brewers, U-brew, home-brewer retail stores, and home brewers with the best hops from the best growers.

name: HOOH / Bitterbine Hop Company
about:
Looks like Bitterbine has morphed into a more collective farm/central processor model under the banner HOOP

"An offshoot of Bitterbine in Lillooet, HOOH is a creative approach to hops production: many farms, one processing facility. If you are within 1 hour of Lillooet, this is a great solution for new farmers."

"We are building a fabulous empire of hops...right here in British Columbia.

We are Harvesters of Organic Hops, but we like the simplicity of HooH. HooH hails from the original Bitterbine Hop Farm established in 2009 and now includes a team of growers from across the Fraser Canyon. "

name: Cedar Valley Hop Yards
about:
wolf 140 processor 
Cedar Valley Hop Yards is located south of Nanaimo in Cedar right along the 49 parallel where the highest quality hops have been known to grow , The driest climate on the island set away from mountains and has long hours of sunshine needed to grow high quality hops.
up to 80 acres

name: Hops Canada
about: We are a locally owned and family-operated, 100% Canadian company. We are dedicated to providing unparalleled customer service and quality products, from local sources and around the world. With dedication to our customers, our aim is to become industry leaders. Our team understands that we can only achieve industry leadership through a high customer satisfaction rating, reflected in our products and service quality. You can purchase with confidence, knowing that you are receiving exceptional product, brought to you by an organization as passionate about beer as you are.

name: Cascadia Hops
about:
Hops from the famous Fraser Valley, once the largest hop growing region in Canada.
 
Cascade, Centennial and 10 other varieties.

"medium size acreage devoted to Cascade and Centennial Hops."

"Fall 2016 will see the first crop Cascade and Centennial Hops and a number of other varieties of hops for the craft beer brewer.  "

name: Valley Hops
about:
multi-year plan is to have 375 acres under production
We are your local hop field installation experts. If you have acreage in the Fraser Valley that you are considering growing hops on, we can provide the expert installation, management, and harvest services required to help you realize the return on investment you are looking for.

name: BC Hop Company
about: BC Hop Company Ltd. located in the beautiful Fraser Valley is your local processing, packaging, marketing and distributor of hops produced by BC farmers.

name: Grandview Farm
about: Grandview Farm, a certified Organic farm in the Fulford Valley - supplies Salt Spring Island Ales

name: Hopanagan Farms
about: We are a local hop farm with Cascade, Centennial and Zeus on the bines! Hops are pelletized & vacuumed sealed. Contact us for prices and rhizome sales!
